scripts.setup: git config core.hooksPath .husky && npm install && uv sync && docker compose up -d postgres && sleep 2 && PORT=$(docker compose port postgres 5432 | cut -d: -f2) && echo "DATABASE_URL=postgresql://adcp:localdev@localhost:$PORT/adcp_registry" >> .env.local && echo "DATABASE_SSL=false" >> .env.local && npm run db:migrate
